channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Wireless Keyboard 850
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Wireless Keyboard 850

item.title: CVE-2018-8117|2024-08-05T06:46:13.463Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20wireless%20keyboard%20850
item.description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists in the Microsoft Wireless Keyboard 850 which could allow an attacker to reuse an AES encryption key to send keystrokes to other keyboard devices or to read keystrokes sent by other keyboards for the affected devices, aka "Microsoft Wireless Keyboard 850 Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Wireless Keyboard 850.
